GSD.description:
PM / devfreq: rk3399_dmc: Disable edev on remove()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.17.14 by commit fb089b6f21de03a685dd31df3789bbb01c59f8e3. For more details please see the references link.
